item.title: "Living Analytics Methods for the Social Web"
experience
item.description: Co-Founder, CEO and Chief Scientist Libre AI Dublin, Ireland February 2017 – Present Adjunct Assistant Professor University College Dublin Dublin, Ireland September 2017 – Present Chief Data Scientist and VP Citi Innovation Lab Dublin, Ireland February 2016 – February 2017 (1 year 1 month) Research Scientist - Machine Learning & Data Science IBM Research Dublin, Ireland January 2014 – January 2016 (2 years 1 month) Lecturer in Computer Science: Machine Learning Leibniz Universität Hannover Hannover, Germany October 2013 – March 2014 (Winter Semester)

item.title: about
item.description: I am the Co-Founder, CEO and Chief Scientist at libre AI, whose mission is to widely disseminate the benefits of AI and ML and make them accessible to the world. I am passionate about the power of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) to support decision making processes. I also serve as Adjunct Assistant Professor at the University College Dublin (UCD). I was the Chief Data Scientist and VP at Citi’s Innovation Lab in Dublin, Ireland, and before that, I was a Research Staff Member at IBM Research - Ireland.
